items.title: Whats At The Core?
items.content_text: Sermon Notes 03/01/2020Day 1: What makes up my foundation?Proverbs 1:7Ephesians 3:172 Timothy 3:14-17Romans 4:1-5, 13-17Day 2: God has given us everything we need to succeed!2 Corinthians12:9-10Genesis 12:1-42 Peter 1:3-8 2 Corinthians 1:20-22Day 3: God sees potential when others can’t.Psalm 40:51 Samuel 16:7Isaiah 55:8-9Psalm 139:17-18Day 4: Make disciples not just believers.Matthew 28:18-20James 2:14-191 Thessalonians 2:7-12Day 5: The message of Jesus doesn’t change.James 1:17Numbers 23:19Psalm 102:25-27Psalm 119:89Day 6: We were created to SERVE!John 13:4-171 Peter 4:10-11Galatians 5:13-14Day 7: Serving requires surrender.John 15:1-8 John 3:1-17Acts 20:351 Peter 5:5-6 Mark 10:44-45`
items.content_html:
Sermon Notes 03/01/2020

Day 1: What makes up my foundation?

  • Proverbs 1:7
  • Ephesians 3:17
  • 2 Timothy 3:14-17
  • Romans 4:1-5, 13-17

Day 2: God has given us everything we need to succeed!

  • 2 Corinthians12:9-10
  • Genesis 12:1-4
  • 2 Peter 1:3-8 2
  • Corinthians 1:20-22

Day 3: God sees potential when others can’t.

  • Psalm 40:5
  • 1 Samuel 16:7
  • Isaiah 55:8-9
  • Psalm 139:17-18

Day 4: Make disciples not just believers.

  • Matthew 28:18-20
  • James 2:14-19
  • 1 Thessalonians 2:7-12

Day 5: The message of Jesus doesn’t change.

  • James 1:17
  • Numbers 23:19
  • Psalm 102:25-27
  • Psalm 119:89

Day 6: We were created to SERVE!

  • John 13:4-17
  • 1 Peter 4:10-11
  • Galatians 5:13-14

Day 7: Serving requires surrender.

  • John 15:1-8
  • John 3:1-17
  • Acts 20:35
  • 1 Peter 5:5-6
  • Mark 10:44-45

`
